channel.title: Making nonwild
channel.description:
ok i serched
[code]public boolean nonWild() {[/code]
under that i added this: [code](absX >= 2535 && absX <= 2633 && absY >= 3108 && absY <=3074 ) ||[/code]
and it is still wild? any 1 help?

item.title: Making nonwild
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

First search for public boolean nonWild()
Then after any || in that, add this

absX >= x1 && absX <= x2 && absY >= y1 && absY <=y2) ||

First step, stand in the southwest corner of the safe zone you want. Then change x1 and y1 to the coords of that. Now stand in the northeast corner of the safezone square. change x2 and y2 to your coords
Should look like this

   -----x2,y2

x1,y1----

Safe and compile

Read full topic
